0.content: After reviewing the business proposal presented by Eco Smart Solutions, we recognized the potential benefits that ESS could bring to Vietnam. Specifically, collaborating with Tri has demonstrated his clear vision, fervor, devotion, and strong sense of accountability, all of which heavily influenced our decision to invest.
0.name: Jody Emmings
0.info: Director of Entrepreneurship and Innovation, Macalester College, USA

1.content: The sustainable business development support solution provided by Eco Smart Solutions is a sustainable and highly effective business model, contributing to the implementation of the sustainable development policies advocated by the government.
1.name: Bui Ton Hien
1.info: Cục trưởng cục Khoa học Lao Động và Xã Hội, Bộ Lao Động Thương Binh và Xã hội, trực tiếp chỉ đạo chính sách phát triển bền vững của Chính Phủ Việt Nam
